introduction: You can log in to your student finance account or sign up. Once registered, you can apply for student finance, see when your payments are due, track your application and change your details.
more_information:
^[Forgotten your password or login details?](https://secure.studentfinance.direct.gov.uk/portal/page?_pageid=379,1732148&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL "Reset password and find login details"){:rel="external"}^

%Part-time students can apply for new finance from Summer 2012.%

$C
**Student Finance England**  
 0845 300 50 90  
$C
overview: Log in to your student finance account or sign up for a new one - see when your payments are due,  track your application, change your details and apply for new finance
title: Register or log in to student finance
